sentences.sentence: That is the unvarying standard of my feelings.
sentences.translation: 这就是我一成不变的感情。

sentences.sentence: Whoever drinks the poison will die consequentially, which is the unvarying truth.
sentences.translation: 任何喝过此毒酒之人都会相继死去，此乃不变之真理。

sentences.sentence: One other unvarying trait of omnipotents is that they seldom take their vacations all at once.
sentences.translation: “万能选手”的另一个典型特点是他么根本不休假。
